verses.plain: If there be therefore any consolation in Christ, if any comfort of love, if any fellowship of the Spirit, if any bowels and mercies,

tokens.t: If
therefore any consolation in Christ, if any comfort of love, if any fellowship of the Spirit, if any bowels and mercies,

verses.plain: Fulfil ye my joy, that ye be likeminded, having the same love, being of one accord, of one mind.

tokens.t: Fulfil ye my joy, that ye be likeminded, having the same love,
of one accord, of one mind.

verses.plain: Let nothing be done through strife or vainglory; but in lowliness of mind let each esteem other better than themselves.

tokens.t: nothing
through strife or vainglory; but in lowliness of mind let each esteem other better than themselves.

verses.plain: Look not every man on his own things, but every man also on the things of others.

tokens.t: Look not every man on his own things, but every man also on the things of others.

verses.plain: Let this mind be in you, which was also in Christ Jesus:

tokens.t: Let this mind be in you, which was also in Christ Jesus:

verses.plain: Who, being in the form of God, thought it not robbery to be equal with God:

tokens.t: Who, being in the form of God, thought it not robbery to be equal with God:

verses.plain: But made himself of no reputation, and took upon him the form of a servant, and was made in the likeness of men:

tokens.t: But made himself of no reputation, and took upon him the form of a servant, and was made in the likeness of men:

verses.plain: And being found in fashion as a man, he humbled himself, and became obedient unto death, even the death of the cross.

tokens.t: And being found in fashion as a man, he humbled himself, and became obedient unto death, even the death of the cross.

verses.plain: Wherefore God also hath highly exalted him, and given him a name which is above every name:

tokens.t: Wherefore God also hath highly exalted him, and given him a name which is above every name:

verses.plain: That at the name of Jesus every knee should bow, of things in heaven, and things in earth, and things under the earth;

tokens.t: That at the name of Jesus every knee should bow, of
in heaven, and
in earth, and
under the earth;

verses.plain: And that every tongue should confess that Jesus Christ is Lord, to the glory of God the Father.

tokens.t: And
every tongue should confess that Jesus Christ
Lord, to the glory of God the Father.

verses.plain: Wherefore, my beloved, as ye have always obeyed, not as in my presence only, but now much more in my absence, work out your own salvation with fear and trembling.

tokens.t: Wherefore, my beloved, as ye have always obeyed, not as in my presence only, but now much more in my absence, work out your own salvation with fear and trembling.

verses.plain: For it is God which worketh in you both to will and to do of his good pleasure.

tokens.t: For it is God which worketh in you both to will and to do of
good pleasure.

verses.plain: Do all things without murmurings and disputings:

tokens.t: Do all things without murmurings and disputings:

verses.plain: That ye may be blameless and harmless, the sons of God, without rebuke, in the midst of a crooked and perverse nation, among whom ye shine as lights in the world;

tokens.t: That ye may be blameless and harmless, the sons of God, without rebuke, in the midst of a crooked and perverse nation, among whom ye shine as lights in the world;

verses.plain: Holding forth the word of life; that I may rejoice in the day of Christ, that I have not run in vain, neither laboured in vain.

tokens.t: Holding forth the word of life; that I may rejoice in the day of Christ, that I have not run in vain, neither laboured in vain.

verses.plain: Yea, and if I be offered upon the sacrifice and service of your faith, I joy, and rejoice with you all.

tokens.t: Yea, and if I be offered upon the sacrifice and service of your faith, I joy, and rejoice with you all.

verses.plain: For the same cause also do ye joy, and rejoice with me.

tokens.t: For the same cause also do ye joy, and rejoice with me.

verses.plain: But I trust in the Lord Jesus to send Timotheus shortly unto you, that I also may be of good comfort, when I know your state.

tokens.t: But I trust in the Lord Jesus to send Timotheus shortly unto you, that I also may be of good comfort, when I know your state.

verses.plain: For I have no man likeminded, who will naturally care for your state.

tokens.t: For I have no man likeminded, who will naturally care for your state.

verses.plain: For all seek their own, not the things which are Jesus Christ’s.

tokens.t: For all seek their own, not the things which are Jesus Christ’s.

verses.plain: But ye know the proof of him, that, as a son with the father, he hath served with me in the gospel.

tokens.t: But ye know the proof of him, that, as a son with the father, he hath served with me in the gospel.

verses.plain: Him therefore I hope to send presently, so soon as I shall see how it will go with me.

tokens.t: Him therefore I hope to send presently, so soon as I shall see how it will go with me.

verses.plain: But I trust in the Lord that I also myself shall come shortly.

tokens.t: But I trust in the Lord that I also myself shall come shortly.

verses.plain: Yet I supposed it necessary to send to you Epaphroditus, my brother, and companion in labour, and fellowsoldier, but your messenger, and he that ministered to my wants.

tokens.t: Yet I supposed it necessary to send to you Epaphroditus, my brother, and companion in labour, and fellowsoldier, but your messenger, and he that ministered to my wants.

verses.plain: For he longed after you all, and was full of heaviness, because that ye had heard that he had been sick.

tokens.t: For he longed after you all, and was full of heaviness, because that ye had heard that he had been sick.

verses.plain: For indeed he was sick nigh unto death: but God had mercy on him; and not on him only, but on me also, lest I should have sorrow upon sorrow.

tokens.t: For indeed he was sick nigh unto death: but God had mercy on him; and not on him only, but on me also, lest I should have sorrow upon sorrow.

verses.plain: I sent him therefore the more carefully, that, when ye see him again, ye may rejoice, and that I may be the less sorrowful.

tokens.t: I sent him therefore the more carefully, that, when ye see him again, ye may rejoice, and that I may be the less sorrowful.

verses.plain: Receive him therefore in the Lord with all gladness; and hold such in reputation:

tokens.t: Receive him therefore in the Lord with all gladness; and hold such in reputation:

verses.plain: Because for the work of Christ he was nigh unto death, not regarding his life, to supply your lack of service toward me.

tokens.t: Because for the work of Christ he was nigh unto death, not regarding his life, to supply your lack of service toward me.
